title: Documents To Go FULL v3.004 Build 1292 Final By bobiras2009
description:
By bobiras2009	
		
If you appreciate my work you can leave a commnent and seed this for as long you can to help me upload more.


Requirements: Android 1.6+
Overview: View Microsoft Word, Excel & PowerPoint Files - All in 1 App!


Full Version Features:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Edit , View & Create Microsoft Word, Excel, & PowerPoint files & high fidelity viewing of your PDFs
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Supports password protected Word & Excel 97-2010 files
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Google Docs! Download, view & edit your files from Google Docs directly in Docs To Go.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Desktop App for bi-directional sync with your deviceÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s USB cable. Seamlessly move files from device to computer using our new, & FREE desktop app (Note: Does NOT support Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1)

More info on Full Version FeaturesÃ¢â‚¬Â¦

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Word To Go includes rich formatting features including bold, italics, underline, font color, alignment, bulleted & numbered lists, tables, bookmarks, comments, footnotes, endnotes, track-changes, word count, find & replace, etc.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Sheet To Go offers powerful data computation with support for 111 functions, cell, number & sheet formatting, row & column preferences, auto-fit options, freeze panes, sort, cut, copy, paste, undo, redo, charting, etc.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Slideshow To Go allows you to effortlessly Ã¢â‚¬Å“flickÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ through slides, review notes, rehearse timing & make last minute changes to presentations on the go.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢PDF To Go provides high-fidelity viewing of important reference materials with options for page view, word wrap, auto-rotate, bookmarks, search, select & copy text, and more...
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Google Docs Support Download, view & edit your files from Google Docs directly in Docs To Go. Any changes you make can be saved & synched back to Google Docs so that you'll always have the most up-to-date version. You can even create new files in Docs To Go & upload them immediately to your account.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Desktop Sync: Transfer files from your Windows PC to your Android device over USB. Any edits made in either location will automatically sync & 100% of the original file formatting will be maintained via our Intact Technology.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Total access with support for attachments, password-protected files, built-in file browser, memory card support, & new Live Folder for recently used documents
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Localized in English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Brazilian Portuguese, Japanese, Turkish, Russian, Polish, Czech and Arabic and traditional and simplified Chinese

Why Documents To Go?
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Full featured Documents To Go is not just a viewer, it's a complete solution with a full range of viewing AND editing features. Simply unlock premium features by purchasing the 'Full Version Key' from the Android Market.

What's in this version:
3.004 (build 1292 - 9/5/2012)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Additional ext. card support (including Samsung S3)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Bug Fixes (including the "r.dvz" bug on ICS devices)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Support desktop sync on the Galaxy Nexus
3.004 (build 1277 - 4/30/2012)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Improved external keyboard support
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed STG crash when inserting/deleting sheets
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed Google Docs errors with ppt/pptx files
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Improved compatibility w/ bundled versions
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Minor bug fixes

Release note:
Install directly and register with any information.


                                   By bobiras2009
